message.name: BLOB2STRING_ENCODER_EXC
message.locale: An error occurred processing a decision for case %1s. The encoding of the rules result failed. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: BLOB2STRING_UNSUPPORTED_ENCODING_EXC
message.locale: An error occurred processing a decision for case %1s. The encoding of the rules result failed as the encoding mechanism %2s is not supported. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: BLOB2STRING_DECODER_EXC
message.locale: An error occurred processing a decision for case %1s. The decoding of the result string '%2s' failed. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: BLOB2STRING_UNSUPPORTED_DECODING_EXC
message.locale: An error occurred processing a decision for case %1s. The decoding of the result string '%2s' failed as the decoding mechanism %3s is unsupported. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: DECISION_TAGVALUE_EXCEEDS_LIMIT
message.locale: The decision tag value(s) length has exceeded the upper limit. Please contact your system administrator.
